newsFedd.title: Greta Thunberg – still making all the right enemies
newsFedd.description: They say she is using ‘the climate movement’ to throw her support behind the Palestinians. Well, good on her.
newsFedd.author: Andrew Mitrovica

newsFedd.title: Israel kills over 40 in Gaza, attacks Lebanon's Beirut again
newsFedd.description: These were the updates on Israel’s attacks on Lebanon and the war on Gaza for Tuesday, October 22.

newsFedd.title: Israel’s siege on north Gaza intensifies as thousands trapped
newsFedd.description: The Israeli military’s weeks long siege of northern Gaza is pushing the area to the point of starvation.

newsFedd.title: As Israel’s siege on north Gaza continues, how are people coping?
newsFedd.description: Israeli forces launched an operation in the north on October 6, laying siege to hundreds of thousands of people.
